Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.tool

Class TestLoadIncrementalHFiles

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.tool.TestLoadIncrementalHFiles
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestLoadIncrementalHFilesSFT, TestSecureLoadIncrementalHFiles
public class TestLoadIncrementalHFiles extends Object
Test cases for the "load" half of the HFileOutputFormat bulk load functionality. These tests run faster than the full MR cluster tests in TestHFileOutputFormat

    • testTagsSurviveBulkLoadSplit

      public void testTagsSurviveBulkLoadSplit() throws Exception
      Test that tags survive through a bulk load that needs to split hfiles. This test depends on the "hbase.client.rpc.codec" = KeyValueCodecWithTags so that the client can get tags in the responses.

    • testNonHfileFolder

      private void testNonHfileFolder(String tableName, boolean preCreateTable) throws Exception
      Write a random data file and a non-file in a dir with a valid family name but not part of the table families. we should we able to bulkload without getting the unmatched family exception. HBASE-13037/HBASE-13227
      Throws:
      Exception
